column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=After I planted a tree the other day , I was all dirty and tired .
#id=2
#text=I decided for a change that instead of a shower I was going to have a bath tonight and relax .
#id=3
#text=First I moved my soap and shampoo down to the side of the tub instead of on their normal shower shelf , then started the water running .
#id=4
#text=Once I got it hot , but not too hot , I closed the drain so the tub would start to fill up .
#id=5
#text=I had an idea at the last minute and grabbed my tablet and a ziploc bag and put the tablet inside it to protect it from splashes .
#id=6
#text=I turned up my stereo so I could head it in the bathroom , then got into the tub .
#id=7
#text=I settled into the warm water and relaxed for a little while , then grabbed my tablet and started reading a book .
#id=8
#text=After about 30 minutes of relaxing , I let some of the water out since it was getting cold , filled up with more hot water and started washing .
#id=9
#text=Once I was cleaned off , I opened the drain and finished up by washing my hair under the shower .
#text=It was a nice change from showering all the time .
